argus.menu.title: Argus
text.autoconfig.argus.title: Argus
text.autoconfig.argus.option.argusHost.@: Address which will be used by the client to connect to a running Argus instance.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.verifyCerti: Whether or not the client should verify that the certificate is valid. Should be on unless connecting locally.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.webUiEnable: Whether or not the Management UI should be started upon connecting to a server.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.webUiPort.@: Which port the Management UI should run on to be accessed by a browser.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.pingColor.@: What color your pings will appear as in-game.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.maxViewDist: How many blocks (or meters) away locations can be seen from.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.yawSliceDeg: How many yaw degrees (left-right) to slice view for combining locations together.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.showAlignme: If locations are stacked together, show text for a count digest.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.showDimensi: If location is in a different dimension, show an indicator.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.sameDimensi: If location is in a different dimension, do not show it.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.streamerMod: Disables rendering of most things to allow for safe public share screening.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.hideChatLoc: If location data is relayed in chat, this will disable it from being shown. Data may still be shared.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.coloredName: Toggle the ability for names to be colored in waypoints and online player display.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.overwriteDe: Whether or not names in player list should be what the server provides or white.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.showStatusE: Toggle the ability for status information to be displayed below a player's name tag when in range.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.showHealthO: Toggle whether or not health should be the only thing displayed for the player's status.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.hiddenGroup: If location data is relayed in chat, this will be the list of groups to hide from chat. Data may still be shared.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.locationTim: When to start showing the timer since the location data was captured.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.cleanLocati: How frequently the location data should be checked for cleanup.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.pingExpirat: How many seconds after a ping was received it should expire.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.locationsEx: How many minutes after a location was received it should expire.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.refreshToke: How frequently the client should check to see if it should refresh the token. Don't recommend changing this.
Minimum amount of time to force a token refresh even before it expires. Don't recommend changing this.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.refreshMemb: How frequently group membership is checked for changes. Don't recommend changing this.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.refreshElec: How frequently group permissions are checked for changes. Don't recommend changing this.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.refreshSock: How frequently connectivity for data sharing is checked. Don't recommend changing this.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.transmitIni: How long to wait for a connection to be established for data sharing.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.transmitLoc: How frequently location data should be shared to the main server.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.statusCheck: How frequently status data should be updated locally before sending it.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.transmitSta: How frequently status data should be shared to the main server.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.readChatEna: If location data is relayed in chat, this will toggle read it.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.readStatusE: If enabled, your status information will be shared.
text.autoconfig.argus.option.readLocalEn: If enabled, you can see players that are around you and their location will be shared.
text.webui.argus.chatMessage: §7[§cArgus§7] §dArgus Management UI is up and can be accessed here:
